name: Roblox Smoothness
description:
This plugin smooths every ugly parts that roblox have and makes it look more fabulous and smoother!

NOTE: I didn't want to change ROBLOX way too much <3
NOTICE: I will add soon new pictures.

I DO NOT OWN THE TRADE SYSTEM, SO SPECIAL THANKS TO: https://userstyles.org/styles/102721/roblox-trader-pro FOR THE TRADE SYSTEM!
additional_info:
UPDATE: Fixed most bugs with viewing clothings (v3.2), Changed the background to something gray-ish (v3.1), Changed the text color again (v3.1), Changed the text color (v3.0), Added a better "Cancel" button (v2.9), Fixed a lot of glitches (v2.8), Fixed some bugs (2.7), Changed the background to space (v2.6), Changed the text color function (v2.6), Changed the chat color (it's dark blue and red) (v2.6), Made as high the number is, darker it gets (v2.6), Made text and link color different (v2.6).

The blur is not there! I just added it to hide the names of people and my money.

Any bugs or something I should beauty-fy? Just message me at ROBLOX or tweet to me at twitter!

-MagicalL

ROBLOX: Lopous
Twitter: @LopousRBLX
Youtube: www.youtube.com/c/LopousRBLX
